test-case.description: Streaming trace() - striding operand, focus-setting usage for inspection action

result.assert: /out = "true false true true true true false false true true true"

test-case.name: sf-trace-030
test-case.description: Streaming trace() - climbing operand, inspection usage

test-case.description: Streaming trace() - climbing operand, inspection usage, removal of duplicates
test-case.keywords: leading-lone-slash striding-then-climbing fn:name PathExpr SimpleMapExpr ancestor-axis

result.assert: /out = "BOOKLIST BOOKS ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM"
